attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I was disgusted at what I saw when I opened up the app. Too too too too many buttons and was very confusing to me and would a thousand percent be to others. I am very disappointed with the work that was not put into this app

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: someone please explain why when I open the app, a cheeto bag pops up and I can’t exit it 🤦🏽‍♀️ I literally just have to stare at the bag?? That’s all the app is? Idk who designed this but cleary, they was not thinking correctly 🤭😗 Apple, just delete the app at this point. It’s useless.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: So I work up and I was like let’s get the app because why not so first I saw the orange man him self then I saw a naked picture of the old orange man so I got scared then I saw him making a horrible speech then I went to sleep the he was there then I screamed yeah so what a horrible app don’t get it 😔😰

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: So I downloaded hoping to get some great Donald action but instead it caused my cats head to start spinning around, my entire family is scarred from this 😤 we took her to the vet and the vet said she’s not sure if it’ll ever stop. Now what the heck am I supposed to do, she can’t even eat 🤦🏼‍♀️

I installed the app in the hopes of finding new and creative ways to show off my patriotism but upon opening the app I miraculously grew a functioning brain and after a few quick scrolls I decided the app was trash and immediately uninstalled it.

attributes.title: first off
attributes.review: the second you open the app it says “keep america great”, first off that’s a lie in the app therefore it’s false information (racism in america, homophobes in america, sexism in america, etc) and afternoon it finished loading it showed a cheeto puff(?) I thought it said Donald Trump- but go off boo, sir this app is trash periodt.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: My phone is broken and I keep getting targeted ads that highlight my greatest insecurities. Please don’t get this app, if you have any respect for yourself you’ll listen.  My phone was unbiased before and now I’m pretty sure it’s racist. Don’t get this app, it will ruin your life.

attributes.title: DISSAPOINTED
attributes.review: The way this app runs is completely unacceptable. I have experienced about 28 glitches in the past 15 mins. I am pretty sure this app contains bugs and will mess up other parts of your phone. Delete immediately. I expected better from Trump. TAKE THIS AS A WARNING

attributes.title: Pls help
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app onto my newly purchased iPhone. It took forever to download and once it did, it immediately gave my phone AND computer a VIRUS. My phone and computer are fried and won’t turn on now...and if that’s not enough I go stomping to my room to find my cat DEAD. 
‼️THIS APP IS LIKE COVID-19 FOR YOUR DEVICE AND CAT

attributes.title: This app is cursed
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my phone glitched out and started getting hot THIS IS THE DEVILS WORK 👹right after my son was possessed by a ghost and started climbing on the walls and yelling crazy curse words. I was so scared so I gave up my religion and I am currently a Devil worshiper. (do not recommend to download this app) 🦋🦋🦋
